com.intel.icecp.core.metadata

Class Persistence

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.icecp.core.metadata.Persistence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Message, Metadata, Serializable

    public class Persistence
extends Object
implements Metadata
    Define how publishers and subscribers should persist messages.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Persistence DEFAULT 
      static Persistence FOREVER 
      static Persistence NEVER_PERSIST 
      long persistFor
      The number of milliseconds to persist a message
      long retrieveUnder
      The number of milliseconds under which persistence implementations must retrieve and serve persisted messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Persistence()
      Build a default persistence object with the default time interval, DEFAULT_PERSISTENCE_MS.
      Persistence(long milliseconds)
      Build a persistence object with the same storage and retrieval times
      Persistence(long persistFor, long retrieveUnder)
      Build a persistence object

      Define whether requests MUST be retrieved in the specified time interval;

      Define whether all messages MUST be persisted; e.g.

        public final long persistFor
        The number of milliseconds to persist a message

        public final long retrieveUnder
        The number of milliseconds under which persistence implementations must retrieve and serve persisted messages.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Persistence

        public Persistence()
        Build a default persistence object with the default time interval, DEFAULT_PERSISTENCE_MS.

      • Persistence

        public Persistence(long milliseconds)
        Build a persistence object with the same storage and retrieval times
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - the number of milliseconds to use for both persistFor and retrieveUnder

      • Persistence

        public Persistence(long persistFor,
                   long retrieveUnder)
        Build a persistence object
        Parameters:
        persistFor - see persistFor
        retrieveUnder - see retrieveUnder

    • Method Detail

      • mustPersist

        public boolean mustPersist()
        Define whether all messages MUST be persisted; e.g. if a message is dropped and cannot be retrieved, Channels adhering to this policy must raise an error condition.
        Returns:
        true if the publisher/subscriber MUST retain the message for the specified persistFor period; if false the publisher/subscriber must only make a best effort to persist for the persistFor period.

      • hasRetrievalLifetime

        public boolean hasRetrievalLifetime()
        Define whether requests MUST be retrieved in the specified time interval;
        Returns:
        true if subscribers SHOULD time out requests longer than retrieveUnder and publishers MUST return a response in under the same; if false, publishers and subscribers are free to ignore time limits during IO.
